buffer:
Human: What is the purpose of the 'Review' screen
AI: The Review screen allows you to review historical data for both online and discharged patients.  (p. 7-17)  It provides several tabs to display this historical data from different perspectives. (p. 7-17)
Human: What are the four color blocks used to indicate different types of events?
AI: Red indicates high priority alarm events; yellow indicates medium priority alarm events; cyan indicates low priority alarm events; and green indicates manual events.  (p. 7-14)  White indicates operation-related events. (p. 7-14)
Human: what is Manufacturer in company contact
AI: I cannot answer from the given information.
